db:abstract.db:para: XdgToplevel represents the toplevel window specific parts of an xdg surface.
This type was introduced in Qt 5.12.

db:section.db:title: Detailed Description
db:section.db:para: This type is part of the XdgShell extension and provides a way to extend the functionality of an XdgSurface with features specific to desktop-style windows.
It corresponds to the Wayland interface xdg_toplevel.

db:section.db:title: [read-only] activated : bool
db:section.db:para: This property holds whether toplevel is drawing itself as having input focus.

db:section.db:title: [read-only] appId : string
db:section.db:para: This property holds the app id of the XdgToplevel.

db:section.db:title: [read-only] decorationMode : enumeration
db:section.db:para: This property holds the current window decoration mode for this toplevel.
The possible values are:

db:td.db:para: The compositor should draw window decorations.
The client should draw window decorations.

db:section.db:title: [read-only] fullscreen : bool
db:section.db:para: This property holds whether the client has acknowledged that it should be fullscreen.

db:section.db:title: [read-only] maxSize : size
db:section.db:para: This property holds the maximum size of the XdgToplevel as requested by the client.
The compositor is free to ignore this value and request a larger size.

db:section.db:title: [read-only] maximized : bool
db:section.db:para: This property holds whether the client has acknowledged that it should be maximized.

db:section.db:title: [read-only] minSize : size
db:section.db:para: This property holds the minimum size of the XdgToplevel as requested by the client.
The compositor is free to ignore this value and request a smaller size.

db:section.db:title: [read-only] parentToplevel : XdgToplevel
db:section.db:para: This property holds the XdgToplevel parent of this XdgToplevel.

db:section.db:title: [read-only] resizing : bool
db:section.db:para: This property holds whether the client has acknowledged that it is being resized.

db:section.db:title: [read-only] title : string
db:section.db:para: This property holds the title of the XdgToplevel.

db:section.db:title: [read-only] xdgSurface : XdgSurface
db:section.db:para: This property holds the XdgSurface for this XdgToplevel.

db:section.db:title: void sendClose()
db:section.db:para: Sends a close event to the client. The client may choose to ignore the event.

db:section.db:title: int sendConfigure(size size, list<int> states)
db:section.db:para: Sends a configure event to the client. size contains the pixel size of the surface. A size of zero means the client is free to decide the size. Known states are enumerated in XdgToplevel::State.

db:section.db:title: void sendFullscreen(size size)
db:section.db:para: Convenience for sending a configure event with the fullscreen state set, and maximized and resizing removed. The activated state is left in its current state.
size is the new size of the window.

db:section.db:title: void sendMaximized(size size)
db:section.db:para: Convenience for sending a configure event with the maximized state set, and fullscreen and resizing removed. The activated state is left in its current state.
size is the new size of the window.

db:section.db:title: void sendResizing(size maxSize)
db:section.db:para: Convenience for sending a configure event with the resizing state set, and maximized and fullscreen removed. The activated state is left in its current state.
maxSize is the new size of the window.

db:section.db:title: void sendUnmaximized(size size)
db:section.db:para: Convenience for sending a configure event with the maximized, fullscreen and resizing states removed, and fullscreen and resizing removed. The activated state is left in its current state.
size is the new size of the window. If size is zero, the client decides the size.

db:section.db:title: size sizeForResize(size size, point delta, uint edges)
db:section.db:para: Convenience for computing the new size given the current size, a delta, and the edges active in the drag.
